title: Tenchi Souzou Design-bu (Heaven's Design Team)
synopsis: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth. He also sought after a wide variety of animals to populate the planet. However, he felt that it was too tiresome to think of new ideas within his criteria. To address this problem, God appointed an organization—the Heaven's Design Team—to do the work instead!
voices: ['Enoki, Junya', 'Hara, Yumi', 'Mizushima, Takahiro', 'Takeuchi, Ryouta', 'Kishio, Daisuke', 'Oozora, Naomi', 'Tomari, Asuna', 'Umehara, Yuuichirou', 'Suwabe, Junichi', 'Oosaka, Ryouta']
staff: [['Masui, Souichi', ['Director']], ['Iida, Satoki', ['Sound Director']], ['Enoki, Junya', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Hara, Yumi', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
